name: rpssreOLD

body.origin:
|- wss(crp, cr)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
-| diffsc(hs0, crp)
-| diffsc(hs0, cr)
body.pretty:
⊢ ℝ+ ⊆ ℝ
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ℝ+ → hs0 ∈ ℝ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ+)
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(crp, cr)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
-| diffsc(hs0, crp)
-| diffsc(hs0, cr)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ℝ+ ⊆ ℝ
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ℝ+ → hs0 ∈ ℝ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ+)
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(crp, cr)
-| diffsc(hs0, crp)
-| diffsc(hs0, cr)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ℝ+ ⊆ ℝ
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ+)
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ)

comment: Obsolete version of ~ rpssre as of 8-Oct-2022. The positive reals are a subset of the reals. (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2008.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
